close_duration.docs:
**, [Time](https://esphome.io/guides/configuration-types.html#config-time)**: The opposite of `open_duration`. Defaults to `22s`.

*See also: [Tormatic/Novoferm Cover](https://esphome.io/components/cover/tormatic.html#configuration-variables)*

open_duration.docs:
**, [Time](https://esphome.io/guides/configuration-types.html#config-time)**: The amount of time the gate is expected to need to go from a fully closed to opened state. Defaults to `15s`. Used to interpolate the position value published to Home Assistant during gate movements, and for stopping the gate at a specific requested position. This value is automatically recalibrated after an uninterrupted closed -> opened movement.

*See also: [Tormatic/Novoferm Cover](https://esphome.io/components/cover/tormatic.html#configuration-variables)*
